select b.board_no,board_title,user_id,board_date,board_content,reply_content from board b join reply r on b.board_no=r.board_no where b.board_no= #{bno}
select * from orders where order_status = 1 or order_status = 2 or order_status = 3 order by order_status

mapper.update: update orders set order_status = 5 where order_no = #{ono}
